workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class TasksRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Task>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.TasksRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<Task>

    @RequestMapping(path="/internal/tasks",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Task.class)
public class TasksRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Task>

      • postClassifier

        @PostMapping(path="/{id}/classifiers",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Classifier\', \'post\') or hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postClassifier(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @Validated(value=Persist.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Classifier classifier,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives a new Classifier, persist if and set into the given Task.
        Parameters:
        id - Task.ID
        classifier - A Classifier to be persisted.
        Returns:
        The persisted Classifier with this Task set.

      • putClassifier

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/classifiers",

 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Classifier\', \'put\') or hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\')")

        Returns:

      • deleteClassifier

        @DeleteMapping(path="{id}/classifiers/{classifierId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteClassifier(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable(name="classifierId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long classifierId)
        Just deletes a Classifier from a given Task.
        Parameters:
        id - Task.ID the Classifier have to be deleted from.
        classifierId - The Classifier.ID to be deleted from the Task.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT
